text:
We're heading into the thick of winter, and if there's one season you need to prep your wardrobe for, this is it. With the chance of polar vortexes and epic snowstorms ahead, there are a few things you need to have in your closet. Yes, you will need a warm puffer jacket and a cozy statement sweater, but we aren't all about business here, you also need a chic party dress, festive cocktail ring, luxe velvet blazer, and more. Ahead, 50 chic winter wardrobe essentials that will cover all of your bases.

RELATED: 47 Head-Turning Holiday Dresses Under $100
title: 50 Chic Winter Wardrobe Must-Haves
